text_block_list.text:
Matikanetannhauser isn't coming...
Just as I was thinking that――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry! I ended up being late!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Actually, on the way here, I ran full-force into a wall
and got a nosebleed...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Plus, I got my jersey dirty, so
I thought I'd wash it right away, but I was out of detergent.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Then, while searching for detergent,
I ran into a door this time...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Things that make you want to say, "Why now!?"
kept happening... I'm really sorry...

Matikanetannhauser is reflecting on this,
so I told her to be careful and ended the matter.
